resources.string:
Welcome to OCalculatoR, here is the guide to use the app: 
 1. Take a picture from CAMERA button. 
 2. Click on DETECT TEXT button to see what words are contained in the picture selected. 
 3. If there is a simple equation on the detected text, you can press on CALCULATE button, to see the result. 
 4. You also can hear what the words are using the SPEAK button and stop it using STOP button. 
 ENJOY :)
